subdesc.subtitle: Overview
subdesc.subdescription:
In this event, the participant will be required to complete a (logical) task (eg: placing cubes in appropriate slots, putting a ball through a hoop etc.). The participant is judged for his ingenuity and swiftness in completing the task.

subdesc.subtitle: Overview
subdesc.subdescription:
An RC Aircraft based event, Wright Flight requires the team to build the structure of the radio controlled plane from scratch (its wings, fuselage, rudder, elevators etc). The participants will be tested on various aspects { eg: take off ,flying, landing and maneuvering about an obstacle}.

subdesc.subtitle: Overview
subdesc.subdescription:
Robowars, as the name suggests is a one on one battle between two bots. The objective of each competitor will be to score more point than the opposite bot to qualify for the next round. There will be certain restrictions with regard to the bot specifications (dimensions, attack and defense mechanisms, power supply etc.)
Please Note: The problem statements have been modified .

subdesc.subtitle: Overview
subdesc.subdescription:
Velocity, which is arguably the largest crowd puller amongst all the events from mechanical events committee, is basically a rc car based event. The entire event consists of three rounds, namely maneuverability test, acceleration test and finally the race. In each of these rounds the participants are required to drive their car through a race track (which will be different for each round) within a specified time period.
Please Note: The problem statements have been modified .
